content: this is a pattern for a super bulky weight beanie knit in the round and using the stranded colourwork technique 100% alpaca yarn is not elastic you may find the smaller needle works better for the rib to achieve a tighter fitting beanie if you are working with 100% alpaca yarn **yarn ** rock hollow farm handspun 100% alpaca wool from tux 70yds and 100% coopersworth wool 37yds **approximate yarn amounts ** colour a tux - 70yds / 64m colour b natural light - 37yds / 34m **needles ** 5 0 - 6 5mm us no 8 - 10 5 circular needles 32in/80cm for cast on and rib 8 0mm us no 11 circular needles 32in/80cm **gauge ** 10 sts and 10 row = 4 in/10 cm over stranded stockinette patterning on 8 0mm needles change needles as needed to keep gauge the same throughout **approximate finished sizes ** one size fits many 21-25 in/53cm-63 5 cm head **additional tools ** needle to weave in ends st markers pom pom maker optional
